Body:
Description: Dear Supportteam, 
we have an urgent issue. We have several content aware policies that are only doing protocols and not blocking any actions. But last week epp client started blocking print outlook memo format. Could you kindly let me know which setting blocks printing outlook memo formats? Thanks. 

Best Regards, 
Siaoyun Chen
What We've Learned Updated: 2025.05.19: The print is blocked by the Browser Printing policy
Next Steps Updated: 2025.05.19: Asked the customer to try a setting, then we will connect if the issue remains.

Next Steps Updated: 2025.05.20: The issue is resolved by updating the client to 6.2.4.2.
Customer will test and confirm in the following days.
2025.05.19: Asked the customer to try a setting, then we will connect if the issue remains.
